about_the_game:
19 officers will be added.

▼Additional Officers
Liu Bei/ Guan Yu/ Zhang Fei/ Huang Zhong/ Xu Shu/ Cao Cao/ Xiahou Dun/ Xiahou Yuan/ Dian Wei/ Xu Zhu/ Jia Xu/ Zhang Liao/ Sun Ce/ Zhou Yu/ Taishi Ci/ Huang Gai/ Gan Ning/ Lu Bu/ Diao Chan

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER" and under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select one of the 8 officers. The available face graphics will appear. Then choose the added officer graphic from the "SPECIAL EDITION".
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
detailed_description:
19 officers will be added.

▼Additional Officers
Liu Bei/ Guan Yu/ Zhang Fei/ Huang Zhong/ Xu Shu/ Cao Cao/ Xiahou Dun/ Xiahou Yuan/ Dian Wei/ Xu Zhu/ Jia Xu/ Zhang Liao/ Sun Ce/ Zhou Yu/ Taishi Ci/ Huang Gai/ Gan Ning/ Lu Bu/ Diao Chan

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER" and under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select one of the 8 officers. The available face graphics will appear. Then choose the added officer graphic from the "SPECIAL EDITION".
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
